slides.text: HYALINE - articular surface covered in a thin layer of cartilage

JOINT CAVITY filled with synovial fluid - provides lubrication and nutrition to the cartilage

SYNOVIAL MEMBRANE - Sleeve of delicate cartilage attached around the periphery of the articular surface - contains SYNOVIAL FLUID
FIBROUS CAPSULE - Externally strengthens the synovial membrane

pages.title: Diagram to show a typical synovial joint
